name: rangebounddatepicker-control
description: RangeBoundDatePicker Power Apps component framework control.

scripts.pack: npm run pack:unmanaged && npm run pack:managed
scripts.pack:managed: mkdir -p dist && dotnet msbuild solution/solution.cdsproj /restore /p:SolutionPackageType=Managed && cp solution/bin/Debug/solution.zip dist/RangeBoundDatePicker_Managed.zip
scripts.pack:unmanaged: mkdir -p dist && dotnet msbuild solution/solution.cdsproj /restore /p:SolutionPackageType=Unmanaged && cp solution/bin/Debug/solution.zip dist/RangeBoundDatePicker_Unmanaged.zip
